DOCNAME: CASE OF BELOUSOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-3 - Length of pre-trial detention);Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-4 - Review of lawfulness of detention)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of their pre - trial detention . In application no . CARDINAL , the applicant also submitted a complaint under LAW .
